name: Perfect Knit T-Shirt
description: This simple, classic top is designed to be your perfect go-to t-shirt! The shaped neckline, slightly relaxed fit, and excellent drape all come together in perfect harmony to create a knitted version of a classic tee.
full_text: This simple, classic top is designed to be your perfect go-to t-shirt! The shaped neckline, slightly relaxed fit, and excellent drape all come together in perfect harmony to create a knitted version of a classic tee. This raglan style t-shirt is worked from the top, down. After the first few rounds are worked flat to shape the front neckline, this t-shirt will be worked in the round. This sweater is available as a kit with Lion Brand Yarn. Click here to shop the kit. This t-shirt is designed in 9 sizes: XS, (S, M, L, XL), (2X, 3X, 4X, 5X) Finished Bust/Chest Circumference: 32, (36, 40, 44, 48), (52, 56, 60, 64)” Finished Length: 22.5, (23, 23, 23.5, 23.5), (24, 24, 24.5, 24.5)” This top is designed to be worn with 0-4” of positive ease at the bust. Model is 6’ tall, has a 33” bust, and is wearing a size small with 3” of positive ease. For best fit, choose a size that is 0-4” larger than your corresponding bust measurement. MATERIALS: 3, (4, 4, 5, 5), (6, 6, 7, 8) sk eins / 696, (928, 928, 1160, 1160), (1392, 1392, 1624, 1624) yards Lion Brand Coboo Yarn (shown in White) Size US 6 (4.0 mm) 32” circular knitting needles Size US 6 (4.0 mm) double pointed needles or small circular needle to work sleeves and neckline Stitch Markers Stitch holder or scrap yarn Tapestry Needle to weave in ends GAUGE: 22 stitches and 28 rows = 4” in stockinette stitch This pattern is written in US English terms.
